overview:
Owner of Constantech.

Born in Brisbane, then moved to the Sunshine Coast aged one, and lived most of my younger life there. Lived in the country town of Cooroy for 6.5 years before moving to the tourist mecca of Noosa. Did a bit of surfing, but was more into motorbikes, because they went faster. I’m a competitive type of person, and love things that go fast, and as such, I love my motorsport. I’ve done quite a bit of karting in my day.

Became a mechanic doing my apprenticeship and working at my father’s Honda dealership in Cooroy, and then doing RACQ breakdown work in Noosa. Moved back to Brisbane in my early twenties to build a career in IT.

Now have two boys, Michael and Tom, who bring me much joy, and help to keep me young.
